• TASTING PASSES FROM 140+ WINERIES • 

• Most wineries charge $5 per person to $20 per person for wine tasting. This GPS enabled App instantly finds FREE Tastings, 2 for 1 Tastings and other deals closest to you.  The App also provides mapped and turn by turn driving directions to each winery. You can also get YELP reviews for each winery along with YouTube videos, flickr photo streams and nearby Tweets.  This is one of the best social media Apps for Wine Country even allowing you to earn badges simply by check-ins via Facebook, Twitter and FourSquare. 

• Simply flash the app and - lookee there! - You saved yourself some serious $$$$

•• Currently features wine tasting offers from over 140+ wineries located in Napa Valley & Sonoma County of California Wine Country. 

•• All offers are approved by participating wineries.
